name: Traccar
description: Modern GPS Tracking Platform for your cars.
longDescription:
Traccar is an open-source GPS tracking system. It's designed to track the location of various GPS-enabled devices like vehicles, personal trackers, or mobile phones in real-time.

Device list: https://www.traccar.org/devices/ , if you need more tracking device, add your ports in ServerApps > Traccar > View Details > Network.

The recommended solution for production use is to link to an external MySQL database.
